name: mediolaSmart-Home
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, set kitchen to 23 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on coming home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect your mediola system to Alexa and control your AIO CREATOR NEO or IQONTROL connected devices by voice.

Requirements for usage with IQONTROL:
- AIO GATEWAY V5
- activated mediola Cloud Services account

Requirements for usage with NEO:
- AIO GATEWAY V5 Plus or NEO Server 
- activated mediola Cloud Services account

To control your devices use the following commands:

Light:
 - Alexa, turn on kitchen light
 - Alexa, turn off kitchen light
 - Alexa, set kitchen light to 42 percent

Thermostat:
 - Alexa, set kitchen thermostat to 23 degrees
 
Blinds:
 - Alexa, set kitchen blind to 32 percent

Macro/ Scene:
 - Alexa, turn on coming home
